Query:
CREATE TABLE samples3db.curated_sales_data_parquet
WITH (
  format = 'PARQUET',
  parquet_compression = 'SNAPPY',
  external_location = 's3://assurebuckets32pkkuppili/athena_output/curated_sales_data_parquet/'
) AS
select f.payment_key,f.coustomer_key,f.store_key,f.item_key,f.quantity,f.unit,f.unit_price,f.total_price,c.name,c.contact_no,i.item_name,i.desc ,i.supplier,s.division,s.district,t.trans_type,t.bank_name from samples3db.fact_table f left join samples3db.customer_table c on f.coustomer_key = c.coustomer_key left join samples3db.item_table i on f.item_key = i.item_key left join samples3db.store_table s on f.store_key = s.store_key left join samples3db.payment_table t on f.payment_key = t.payment_key
